Text: how i can instal this game ?? beacouse i can't lunch this aplication at all. HELP SGS 2 no root
Woot! I've been searching for this for the past 2days (ago). Because of you imma enjoy this!
the controls are a little off but still the best block game so far for android.

To install just change the file extension to 'apk'.
e.g. 'Survivalcraft_1.17._update_apk' to 'Survivalcraft_1.17.apk'.
